verses.verse: A songe of the steares. When I was in trouble, I called vpon the Lorde, and he hearde me.
Delyuer my soule, O Lorde, from lyenge lyppes, and from a disceatfull tonge.
What rewarde shall be geuen or done vnto the, thou false tonge?
Euen myghtie & sharpe arowes, wt hote burnynge coales.
Woo is me, that I am constrayned to dwell with Mesech, and to haue myne habitacyon amonge the tentes of Cedar.
My soule hath longe dwelt amonge them, that be enemyes vnto peace.
I laboure for peace, but when I speake therof, they make them to battayle.
